titleStmt.title: A wonderful example of God's justice shewed upon one Jasper Conningham a gentleman born in Scotland, who was of opinion, that there was neither God, nor Devil. To the tune of, O neighbour Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Alex. Milbourn at the Stationers-Arms in Green-Arbour-Court in the Little Old-Baily.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
